snippet: Talks between the United States and China set a positive tone, but there is hard work ahead.
abstract: Editorial holds informal talks between Pres Obama and China's Pres Xi Jinping set a positive tone but there is still hard work ahead; points out no apparent headway was made on pressing issues of cyberattacks and China's increasingly assertive claims in South China and East China seas.
lead_paragraph: Talks between the United States and China set a positive tone, but there is hard work ahead.

headline.seo: Fresh Start for a Critical Relationship Between the U.S. and China
headline.main: Fresh Start for a Critical Relationship
headline.print_headline: Fresh Start for a Critical Relationship
